name: YouTube Grayer Googler
description:
This is a modified version of style 1078 by user 667, to enable the style to work with the YouTube Googler Greasemonkey script.

You can get the YouTube Googler Greasemonkey script from http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/6198

08/06/07 Long overdue update. Luckily for me, the more recent versions of style 1078 needed very little modification to get it to work with the script.
